g.text: UC23 - Sends an SMS message with information about the scheduled appointment
UC22 - Sends an email or SMS to the user confirming that the recovery period has ended
UC9 - Register a vaccination center to respond to a certain pandemic
UC11 - Get a list of employees with a given function/role
UC12 - Specify a new vaccine type
UC13 - Specify a new vaccine and its administration process
UC14 - Load a set of users from a CSV file
UC5 - Consult the users in the waiting room of a vaccination center
UC7 - Checks SNS user Vaccination History
UC8 - Get System Instructions Regarding the Vaccine
UC2 - Schedule a Vaccine For a User
UC4 - Arrivals Registration and Presence Confirmation
